name: ISLAND SURVIVAL (itch) (THE2d/3dGAMEDEV)
description:
fishing simulator where you catch fish sell it for an upgrade 

 TUTORIAL

•click fish to fish

There a chance you can catch a fish

•if you have 5 in your bag you can click the package to create a fishing spot

Look around to find your new fishing  spot

•if you have 10 in your bag click the package again to upgrade your fishing spot
